snippet: An American Marine reservist who had been held in a Mexican jail for months was freed on psychological grounds on Friday, according to court documents.
abstract: Andrew Tahmooressi, an American Marine reservist who had been held in a Mexican jail for months after arriving at the border from California with guns in his vehicle, is freed by Tijuana judge to allow him to seek treatment for post-traumatic stress disorder developed after service in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: An American Marine reservist who had been held in a Mexican jail for months was freed on psychological grounds on Friday, according to court documents.

headline.main: Mexico: American Marine Is Released From Jail
headline.print_headline: Mexico: American Marine Is Released From Jail
